description:
Carousel is the gallery made by Dropbox for all your photos and videos.

Keeping track of your photos can be tough. Carousel lets you view all the photos and videos from your phone and Dropbox in one place, organizes them automatically, and backs them up to Dropbox. 

Carousel is also the fastest way to privately share photos with friends and family — send a single photo or a whole day’s worth in just a few taps. Stop worrying about your photos, and get back to enjoying them. 

Why you need Carousel:
● Have photos and videos spread across your phone and Dropbox? Browse everything in single gallery that’s automatically organized into events.
● Keep all your photos with you without running out of space. Photos and videos in Carousel are viewable from your phone even when you’re offline, but take up almost no space on your phone! 
● Automatically back up your photos and videos to Dropbox — your memories will stay safe even if you lose your phone or your hard drive crashes. 
● Share a day’s worth of photos as quickly as one. Never deal with the hassle of emailing photos again. Recipients can view your photos even if they don't have the Carousel app.
● Go social. Post photos directly from Carousel to Facebook, Twitter, email, SMS, and more.

Got questions, problems, or feedback? Let us know at hello@carousel.com.
releaseNotes:
We've updated Carousel with one of your most requested features: support for iPad! Now, view your photos and continue conversations on a bigger screen.

Plus, we've added support for posting to Instagram and WhatsApp!

We love hearing your feedback. If you've got more feature requests, keep 'em coming at hello@carousel.com.
